attr.title: Fox Tower
attr.desc: One-button platformer about climbing a hill ... and maybe even a tower. The game features beautiful pixel art visuals, pleasing music, and challenging platforming with simple one-button controls.
attr.inst: All files included and ready to run. Thanks to [Nozomu Games](https://nozomu57.itch.io/) for the fantastic game and permission to distribute the files.
attr.inst_md: All files included and ready to run. Thanks to [Nozomu Games](https://nozomu57.itch.io/) for the fantastic game and permission to distribute the files.
